awardsHtml:
2 wins & 14 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

2019 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series
Matt Weaver - Brian McGinn - Andrew Fried - David Gelb - Dane Lillegard
2018 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for a Nonfiction Program
Adam Bricker (director of photography) (For episode "Corrado Assenza")
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Documentary or Nonfiction Series
David Gelb - Andrew Fried - Brian McGinn - Matt Weaver - Dane Lillegard
2017 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for a Nonfiction Program
Will Basanta (For episode "Virgilio Martinez")
2016 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for Nonfiction Programming
David Gelb (director) (For episode: "Gaggan Anand".)

Motion Picture Sound Editors, USA

2017 Nominee Golden Reel Award
Best Sound Editing - Sound Effects, Foley, Dialogue and ADR in Short Form Documentary in Television
William McGuigan (supervising sound editor) - Nikola Simikic (sound effects editor) (Episode: "Alex Atala (2016)")
2016 Nominee Golden Reel Award
Best Sound Editing - Short Form Documentary in Television
William McGuigan (supervising sound editor)

Golden Trailer Awards

2017 Nominee Golden Trailer
Best Documentary/Reality TV Series Poster

Hollywood Music In Media Awards (HMMA)

2017 Nominee Hollywood Music In Media Awards (HMMA)
Best Original Score - Documentary
Duncan Thum (composer) - Sebastian Örnemark (composer) - Steven Gernes (composer) (For episode "Virgilio Martinez".)

International Documentary Association

2017 Nominee IDA Award
Best Episodic Series
Andrew Fried (executive producer) - David Gelb (executive producer) - Dane Lillegard (executive producer) - Brian McGinn (executive producer) - Matt Weaver (executive producer)
2016 Nominee IDA Award
Best Episodic Series
David Gelb - Andrew Fried - Dane Lillegard - Brian McGinn - Matt Weaver
2015 Winner IDA Award

Video - Food & Drink
